thread.section_title: Mazuma Mobile Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mazuma Mobile Australia | mazumamobile.com.au
thread.title: CustomerFrank Cush
thread.title_full: Mazuma Mobile Australia reviewed by CustomerFrank Cush

author: CustomerFrank Cush
title: CustomerFrank Cush
text: Advised of my mobile phone make and model and received offer. Parcel packed promptly arrived for phone to be posted . Cheque arrived promptly thereafter per offer. Very happy customer. Have used Mazuma before and will continue to use Mazuma in the future.
